LenovoUpdateService.description: These properties shall be refered Lenovo Oem properties for update service schema.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FirmwareServices.description: This is a link to a collection of firmware services.
FirmwareServices.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the LenovoFirmwareServices schema.

FirmwaresDataReady.description: Get the status of firmwares data.
FirmwaresDataReady.longDescription: This setting is to get the status of firmwares data.

XCCBackupAutoPromote.description: Auto promote primary xcc to backup.
XCCBackupAutoPromote.longDescription: This setting is to control backup xcc auto sync with primary xcc.

title: #LenovoUpdateService.v1_0_0
